quotes: The best way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
In diversity there is beauty and there is strength.
The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
The future depends on what you do today.
You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
The most effective way to do it, is to do it.
Life is what happens when you're busy making other plans.
The mind is everything. What you think you become.
The best preparation for tomorrow is doing your best today.
Creativity is intelligence having fun.
You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
Act as if what you do makes a difference. It does.
The most courageous act is still to think for yourself. Aloud.
You don't have to see the whole staircase, just take the first step.
A person who never made a mistake never tried anything new.
The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
Don't count the days, make the days count.
It always seems impossible until it's done.
Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
You are stronger than you think.
Happiness is not something ready-made. It comes from your own actions.
The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
The best way to predict your future is to create it.
Vulnerability is the birthplace of innovation, creativity and change.
Kindness is a language which the deaf can hear and the blind can see.
Logic will get you from A to B. Imagination will take you everywhere.
We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
Do not wait for leaders; do it alone, person to person.
The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
You are enough just as you are.
The most wasted of all days is one without laughter.
A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.
The best dreams happen when you're awake.
Life isn't about finding yourself. It's about creating yourself.
Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
Success is the sum of small efforts, repeated day in and day out.
Chance favors the prepared mind.
A smile is a curve that sets everything straight.
Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible.
Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
Details matter. It's worth waiting to get it right.
To live is the rarest thing in the world. Most people exist, that is all.
He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
Time spent with cats is never wasted.
Fantasy is hardly an escape from reality. It's a way of understanding it.
In nature, nothing is perfect and everything is perfect.
Nature never hurries, yet everything is accomplished.
The world is full of magical things patiently waiting for our wits to grow sharper.
Nothing happens until something moves.
You'll miss the best things if you keep your eyes shut.
Growth is never by mere chance; it is the result of forces working together.
We still do not know one thousandth of one percent of what nature has revealed to us.
Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.
There is a crack in everything, that's how the light gets in.
Slow is smooth, and smooth is fast.
A library is not a luxury but one of the necessities of life.
Even miracles take a little time.
You never know how strong you are until being strong is your only choice.
The moon is a friend for the lonesome to talk to.
The Earth is what we all have in common.
Every pawn is a potential queen.
Everyone is a moon and has a dark side which he never shows to anybody.
It is not the strongest of the species that survives, but the one most responsive to change.
You never conquer a mountain. You only stand on the summit a few moments before the wind blows your footprints away.
The bee is more honored than other animals, not because she labors, but because she labors for others.
You don't have to control your thoughts. You just have to stop letting them control you.
The clearest way into the Universe is through a forest wilderness.
The mind is not a vessel to be filled, but a fire to be kindled.
Your uniqueness is your magic.
Physics is imagination in a straightjacket.
Survival is the ability to swim in strange water.
We leave fingerprints on everything we touch.
It is not more vacation we need, it is more vocation.
A meow massages the heart.
Keep a green tree in your heart and perhaps a singing bird will come.
The brain is wider than the sky.
Thunder is good, thunder is impressive; but it is lightning that does the work.
Speak only if it improves upon the silence.
Beer is proof that God loves us and wants us to be happy.
There are always flowers for those who want to see them.
Shoot for the moon. Even if you miss, you'll land among the stars.
The Earth does not belong to us: we belong to the Earth.
Time spent with cats is never wasted.
There is a crack in everything, that's how the light gets in.
The best way to make your dreams come true is to wake up.
Walking is man's best medicine.
Life is either a daring adventure or nothing.
Adopt the pace of nature: her secret is patience.
Laughter is the sun that drives winter from the human face.
Change is the end result of all true learning.
Health is the greatest gift.
If you want to find the secrets of the universe, think in terms of energy, frequency and vibration.
You can discover more about a person in an hour of play than in a year of conversation.
